extendedInfo.description: Smart Repeat enables you to select and repeatedly listen to only a designated section of a tune or an audio book. Have you ever wanted to repeatedly listen to only a particular section of a language program?Or ever wanted to listen to all the new word sections? Using Smart Repeat, you can make your own 'audio program'. No need to edit the original file. All you need is to tap where you want to start and tap where you want to stop. Then Smart Repeat will repeat only the selected section of music or audio file as many times as you want. Want to rewind only 5 seconds? Want to fast-forward exactly 30 seconds? You can customize the skip search buttons to the number of seconds you want to skip.Smart Repeat can also 'bookmark' a particular spot of a file.Bookmarks can be accessed with a tap on the skip button.Set the number of times you want to repeat, and Smart Repeat will repeat the file as many times as you want and automatically moves to the next file. Or you can choose to endlessly repeat the same section over and over again.Big PLAY, PAUSE button is easy to tap!You can select the colors of buttons from a wide variety!If earphone is disconnected or when receiving an incoming phone call, Smart Repeat will automatically pause. Want to learn French, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, German, Russian, Mandarin, Cantonese, Korean, Japanese, Arabic, Nepali, Hindi, Thai, Cambodian, Philipino, Indonesian or Swahili?"Repetition is the mother of learning"!Use Smart Repeat to help you master a language! Differences between free edition and paid edition1. Free edition displays advertisements. Paid edition does not.2. Free edition can mount only up to five files on the play list. Paid edition has no restriction on the number of files.

reviews.title: Yesssssssss!
reviews.comment: Have to learn songs for a show that I\'m in. This helps me to learn those tricky lyrics big time. Love it!
reviews.author: Len Free

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Really useful for learning lines, revising and song lyrics. Thank you!
reviews.author: Greta Scott

reviews.title: jwkelley
reviews.comment: This is a fantastic device.  It would be nice if they had a shuffle feature for jumping between marks though.
reviews.author: Joseph Kelley
